# App Store Connect API 2.4 release notes

**Article**

Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

### New features

- Added support for product page optimization tests that run without being interrupted by new app version releases with the new [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-store-version-experiments].
- A new [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/actors] resource provides details on which team member submitted and last interacted with an App Store submission.
- Added the ability to look up territory availability from an in-app purchase with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-inAppPurchaseAvailability] or from a subscription with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-subscriptionAvailability].
- Updated the limit for return values to 8000 for [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-pricePoints] and [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-pricePoints].

### Deprecations

- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_] endpoint is now deprecated and replaced with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_].
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appStoreVersionExperiments] endpoint is now deprecated and replaced with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments].
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_] endpoint is now deprecated and replaced with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_].
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/DELETE-v1-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_] endpoint is now deprecated and replaced with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/DELETE-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_].
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-appStoreVersionExperiments] endpoint is now deprecated and replaced with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-appStoreVersionExperimentsV2].
- The `pricePoints` include for [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-inAppPurchasesV2] is no longer available.
- The `pricePoints` include for [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_] is now deprecated and replaced with [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-inAppPurchases-_id_-pricePoints].

## Versions

- **App Store Connect API 4.1 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 4.0 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
